name: Astro Link: Data Connector (GGJ2018)
description: Astro Link has sent it's best technician out to help link up some satellites in space. As the technician, you will need navigate the field while trying to connect the transmitter(green) to the receiver(white) by placing reflectors. However, you have a limited amount of fuel which allows you only so much time on the field. Move Lasers around! Bounce stuff off your butt! The world is your oyster! [Check it out!](https://i.imgur.com/xezvdA0.mp4) To complete your task, you must connect the beam from the transmitter to receiver under the allowed time.
